ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class ClaimantEditItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantEditItemController

  • public class ClaimantEditItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    This ClaimantEditItemController is a controller class of Item. By calling this class, user(claimant) can edit the detail information of a Item.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    DateFormat, ParseException, SimpleDateFormat, Date, Locale

    • Method Detail

      • editItem

        public void editItem(java.lang.String dateSTR,
            java.lang.String category,
            java.lang.String description,
            java.lang.Double amount,
            java.lang.String currency)
              throws StatusException
        This class will allows claimants edit the detail information of the claim, including date, category, description, amount and currency. It will also checks StatusException() warning to prevent crush.
        Parameters:
        dateSTR - a String variable
        category - a String variable
        description - a String variable
        amount - a Double variable
        currency - a String variable
        Throws:
        StatusException
        See Also:
        DateFormat, ParseException, SimpleDateFormat, Date
